base_description: Rectangular white shelf with two levels.
part_description: Includes two horizontal shelves, four vertical supports, and four wheels. Shelves are parallel, rectangular, and positioned at top and middle. Supports are at each corner, connecting shelves. Wheels attached to bottom of supports.
internal_interaction_description: The top and middle shelves are supported by four vertical supports at each corner, providing stability. The shelves are parallel, allowing for even distribution of weight. The wheels connect to the bottom of the supports, enabling mobility and facilitating movement.
external_interaction_description: Designed to hold various items on its shelves, it interacts with users by providing storage and organization. The wheels allow it to be moved easily across surfaces, making it versatile for different spaces. It can be placed against walls or in open areas for easy access.
